components.heading: welcome to the responsive layout garden
paragraphs: This page contains a variety of responsive layouts that can be mixed and matched to create a custom site for many use cases.

components.heading: This module contains a centered header&nbspelement
This module is for showcasing features in a card-based Format
components.subheading: Up to six features fit this format comfortably

list-items.heading: Header Element
paragraphs: Tell people what this module is about with a bold, glanceable header.

list-items.heading: Subheading
paragraphs: add a brief subheading to provide additional context.

list-items.heading: Supporting Icons
paragraphs: Include icons to complement the text content of each feature card.

list-items.heading: Feature List
paragraphs: Highlight important features with an icon-based or numbered list.

list-items.heading: Alignment
paragraphs: Cards will auto align to each other based on the number of features.

list-items.heading: Customizability
paragraphs: Replace this text with some content of your own to get started.

components.heading: Product Reviews
components.subheading: Hear what our customers have to say

list-items.quote: This layout template was incredibly versatile and saved me hours of design work. I highly recommend&nbspit.
